game.name: A little Jumpingspider's Garden Adventure (Day 1+2)
game.categories: Single-player, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Touch Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Experience the world through the eyes of a cute little jumpingspider! All levels have completely different mechanics and each one challenges you in its own unique way. Let's go for an amazing ride!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience the world through the eyes of a cute little jumpingspider! All levels have completely different mechanics and each one challenges you in its own unique way. Let's go for an amazing ride!
